flawed_nl_solution:
Adam will teach 50 * 9 = <<50*9=450>>450 students in 9 years.
So, in 10 year Adam will teach 450 + 40 = <<450+40=500>>500 students.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 490, not 500. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
